short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get all news and trending stories from the web every time you open your new tab along with a news search functionality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Newsprompt brings to you top stories from around the world and personalized recommendations just for you right in your new tab along with a news search functionality. Newsprompt delivers highly personalized content without you having to change any settings or customization. From the sports team you follow or the celebrity you love or the company that interests you, get the latest updates for all the stuff that you care about.

1. Get the full picture, without the clutter.

NewsPrompt scans 1000+ top websites in real time to get you the biggest stories happening right now. Stories on the top news section will be those you would see on most big news sites. Now you just have to see 1 page to see what everyone is showing. 

2. Recommendations that you will actually like.

Newsprompt recommends to you news and stories based on your browsing history, sites and topics you like and content categories that interest you. Our personalized recommendations skim through the noise to find articles which we know you will like to read & share. Expect to see

- The latest updates of your favorite sports/sports teams.
- Updates from locations/companies that you have been reading about.
- Latest news and gossip regarding celebrities that you follow.
- Updates on events that you have been reading about.

All of this and much more... without any settings/customizations from your end.

3. Minimal repetition, maximum coverage.

Unlike your social feeds, our smart algorithms ensure removal of duplicate stories so you get through news faster.
 
When big stories break out, your social feed gets cluttered with articles which basically say the same stuff. Newsprompt takes care of this and ensures that you see the top article for each news topic. You can still explore any topic is depth via "More" and "Explore in Depth" buttons.

 
4. Not just news, but everything that the internet is talking about right now.

Never miss out on a global trending article ever again. Newsprompt ensures that you keep discovering stories worth sharing and reading - whether it is about Donald Trump(Drumpf) or a hilarious new cat video which has won the internet.   

5. Get access to direct news search feature from your newtab page.

Want to check your favorite sports team news? Just search for your team in the newtab search box and you will get latest news articles covering them in the autosuggestions.


About Newsprompt

We are a bunch of news enthusiasts who like to consume the best stories on the internet, with minimal waste of time. We built this extension primarily for ourselves, and we hope you will love to use this as well!

Your feedback would help us improve! Email us at kornell.alex@gmail.com

Note: We collect and store your anonymized browsing history to show you personalized recommendations.

Please review our privacy and data policy at https://www.newsprompt.co/privacy-policy
